mapper.select: SELECT token FROM ( SELECT token FROM refresh_token WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND profile_id = #{profileId} AND device_id = #{deviceId} ORDER BY created_at DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO refresh_token (token, member_id, profile_id, device_id) VALUES (#{request.refreshToken}, #{request.memberId}, #{request.profileId}, #{request.deviceId})
